show.title: Love is Right In front of You
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://applinks.kukufm.com/NFYNCEY4xPf5aXFY6
show.description: Eighteen years ago, due to a car accident, the third daughter of the Lu family, Lu Xing'er, was abandoned by her father, who favored sons over daughters. She was left to die on a stormy night after losing too much blood while trying to save her brother. In her final moments, she was discovered by a kind-hearted scavenger, Hu Qiang. Unable to let this precious life slip away, Hu Qiang spent all his savings to save her and renamed her Hu Xiaoya. Although life is tough, for Xiaoya, love is right in front of her...
show.description_secondary: Eighteen years ago, due to a car accident, the third daughter of the Lu family, Lu Xing'er, was abandoned by her father, who favored sons over daughters. She was left to die on a stormy night after losing too much blood while trying to save her brother. In her final moments, she was discovered by a kind-hearted scavenger, Hu Qiang. Unable to let this precious life slip away, Hu Qiang spent all his savings to save her and renamed her Hu Xiaoya. Although life is tough, for Xiaoya, love is right in front of her...

author.name: Shafin Prem
author.bio: delivering the best in your feed
